Title: With you in charge I am at ease
Designer: Guangxi People's Publishing House Art Creation Class - Guangxi renmin chubanshe meishu chuangzuo xuexi ban (广西人民出版社美术创作学习班)
Publisher: Guangxi renmin chubanshe (广西人民出版社)
Notes: "With you in charge, I am at ease", Mao writes on a piece of paper that he hands over to Hua Guofeng. Huauses this document - which may or may not be authentic - to prove Mao really appointed him as successor.
Theme: Mao and Hua: 'With you in charge, I'm at ease'
